overview.title: About UX Aspects
overview.description: UX Aspects provides all of the essentials required for your big data project, allowing you to swiftly create dashboards and reports that provide users with the insights they crave from their big data applications. UX Aspects is based on best-of-breed, open source technologies, including Angular, Bootstrap and D3. It is easy to include in your web applications with NPM.

features.title: Angular
features.description: Angular components make it quick and easy to build your application!

features.title: Analytics
features.description: UX Aspects has a wide range of powerful charts giving you many ways to present data.

features.title: Accessible
features.description: Components and examples are designed to help applications meet the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.

features.title: Responsive
features.description: Components are designed to be responsive, working great on mobile, desktop, and tablets.

showcase.title: Made with UX Aspects
showcase.description: UX Aspects is being used to develop next generation enterprise applications. View some of our examples to get you started!

social.title: Get Involved
social.description: Get involved in the UX Aspects project. Suggest new features, report issues or take part in development.

links.title: Teams
links.description: Take a look at the Teams channel to keep up with the latest news and updates from the UX Aspects team or to get in touch with us!

links.title: GitHub
links.description: Fork UX Aspects on GitHub and submit a pull request to help contribute to the project! Or if you have discovered an issue, report it to us.
